clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates enlarged, no hydronephrosis.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Gallbladder shows smooth-walled, no stones or wall thickening.
Left kidney shows smooth-walled, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Prostate is mildly thickened; volume approximately 11.09 cc.
